thread.title: Vincente Fox Claps Back and Curses at Trump on Twitter…Again
thread.title_full: Vincente Fox Claps Back and Curses at Trump on Twitter…Again

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Vincente Fox Claps Back and Curses at Trump on Twitter…Again
text:
Vincente Fox Claps Back and Curses at Trump on Twitter…Again by Lindsey Ellefson | 9:48 am, January 26th, 2017 
Donald Trump has been moving forward with his plans to build a wall on the Mexican border and as recently as an interview with ABC News that aired yesterday, he was still insisting that Mexico will pay for it. 
As opponents and proponents of the wall alike argue over the minutiae of the plan, one person has stood firm in their position. That person is former Mexican president Vincente Fox , who has already said his country is “not paying for that fucking wall,” not once , but twice . 
When Trump tweeted this… of jobs and companies lost. If Mexico is unwilling to pay for the badly needed wall, then it would be better to cancel the upcoming meeting. 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 26, 2017 
…Fox responded with this: Donald, don’t be self-indulgent. Mexico has spoken, we will never ever pay for the #FuckingWall . https://t.co/a79WDY5vlv 
— Vicente Fox Quesada (@VicenteFoxQue) January 26, 2017 
Yeah, he hashtagged it.
